name: date
author: johnsonfung
description: Insert dates with various formats and offsets, including business days

commands.name: today
commands.description: Insert today's date, optionally offset by days.

commands.name: tomorrow
commands.description: Insert tomorrow's date, optionally offset by additional days.

commands.name: yesterday
commands.description: Insert yesterday's date, optionally offset by additional days.

commands.name: business_day
commands.description: Insert a date offset by business days (excludes weekends).
